name: load eft
desc: The load_eft module reads EVS Textured Field (*.eft) files and displays them.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Vertical Offset
properties.desc: Vertical Offset translates your entire model in Z by the value input multiplied by the Z Exaggeration.  This is useful if you want to move your model to avoid having coincident objects.
